snippet.title: Songs of Silence - 1.0 Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Songs of Silence is a beautifully crafted mix of strategic campaigns and fast-paced tactical battles, brought to life with stunning Art Nouveau-inspired visuals. Whether you enjoy single-player campaigns or multiplayer skirmishes, the game offers endless replayability in a richly detailed world.

Songs of Silence 1.0 coming on November 13th, 2024 to PC, PlayStation and Xbox

Songs of Silence  
🎮 Epic 4X fantasy strategy game 
⚔️Fast-paced, tactical gameplay
🎨 Art Nouveau-inspired visuals 
👥 Multiplayer support for up to 5 players
🌍 A rich world filled with stories and secrets 
🎼 An epic soundtrack by Hitoshi Sakimoto (Final Fantasy Tactics) 


🟣 GOG – gog.com/en/game/songs_of_silence
🔵 Steam – store.steampowered.com/app/2195410
🔴 Humble – humblebundle.com/store/songs-of-silence 

📜 Learn more at songs-of-silence.com
📰 Press Kit – impress.games/press-kit/rcp/songs-of-silence
